transcription: Hello, who am I on to? This is Mr. Chinato. Mr. Chinato, why are you calling? Is there a problem? Yeah, I only want to ask if you will be needing a $2 billion. Because I have access to cash at the moment. $2 billion is not enough money to get my attention. Please, can you come up with a little bit more? Okay, if that should be the case, can a trillion dollars make sense? Now you are talking. So, yeah, so it should be the last we know for my child. Alright, thank you for making this call. Have a nice day.
